scripts.pre:commit: npm run fmt:write && npm run fix
scripts.build: npm run update:lib && npm run clean && tsc
scripts.start: npx cross-env NODE_ENV_SCRIPT=serve cross-env NODE_PATH=./dist node -r dotenv/config ./dist/bootstrap.js
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV_SCRIPT=serve cross-env NODE_PATH=./dist node -r dotenv/config ./dist/bootstrap.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV_SCRIPT=script cross-env NODE_PATH=./dist node -r dotenv/config ./dist/bootstrap.js
scripts.cli: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV_SCRIPT=cli cross-env NODE_PATH=./dist node -r dotenv/config ./dist/bootstrap.js
scripts.deploy:server:dev: npm run build && gcloud app deploy --appyaml=./app.yaml --project=nftc-dev
scripts.deploy:server:prod: npm run build && gcloud app deploy --appyaml=./app.yaml --project=nftc-infinity
